DOC.brief_summary: This trial examines weaning outcomes using the rapid shallow breathing index rate.
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Weaning Outcomes by Using Rate of Change of Rapid Shallow Breathing Index
DOC.detailed_description: We hypothesize that the trend of the Rapid Shallow Breathing Index or RSBI rate, is a better predictor of weaning outcome than the RSBI as a single value during the weaning trial. patients are recruited during a weaning trial on t-piece and the RSBI during what the RSBI is measured periodically. The outcome is ventilatory status at 24 hours after the weaning trial.
DOC.criteria: Requires need of mechanical ventilation for > 48 hours with a tube size no smaller than 7.5 Healthy volunteers
